text: (muḥmiṉkaḷē!) Nīṅkaḷ evvaḷavutāṉ virumpiṉālum, maṉaiviyariṭaiyē nīṅkaḷ nītam celutta cāttiyamākātu. Āṉāl (orē maṉaiviyiṉ pakkam) muṟṟilum cāyntu maṟṟavaḷai antarattil toṅka viṭappaṭṭavaḷ pōṉṟu ākkiviṭātīrkaḷ;. Nīṅkaḷ (allāhvukkup) payantu camātāṉamāka naṭantu koḷvīrkaḷāṉāl, niccayamāka allāh mikavum maṉṉippavaṉākavum, mikka karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉākavum irukkiṉṟāṉ
